faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our IPTV service

items.question: What is IPTV?
items.answer: IPTV (Internet Protocol Television) is a service that delivers television content over Internet Protocol networks. This is in contrast to delivery through traditional terrestrial, satellite, and cable television formats.

items.question: How many devices can I use with one subscription?
items.answer: Our standard subscription allows you to use our service on up to 2 devices simultaneously. Premium subscriptions allow for up to 4 devices at once.

items.question: Do I need a special device to use your IPTV service?
items.answer: Our service works on many devices including smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, computers, and streaming devices like Amazon Fire Stick, Android TV Box, and Apple TV. Check our Device Compatibility page for more details.

items.question: What internet speed do I need?
items.answer: We recommend a minimum internet speed of 10 Mbps for SD content, 25 Mbps for HD content, and 50 Mbps for 4K content. A stable connection is more important than raw speed.

items.question: Can I watch content on-demand?
items.answer: Yes, our service includes a large library of on-demand content including movies and TV shows, in addition to live TV channels.

items.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account dashboard. Navigate to 'Subscription' and click on 'Cancel Subscription'. Your service will remain active until the end of your current billing period.

items.question: Is there a free trial available?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 24-hour free trial so you can test our service before committing to a subscription. Contact our support team to request a trial.

installation.title: Installation Guide
installation.description: Step-by-step instructions to set up our IPTV service on your devices

android: Download and install the IPTV Player app from the Google Play Store
Open the app and select 'Add a playlist'
Enter the M3U URL provided in your welcome email
Your channels should now load and be ready to watch
ios: Download and install the IPTV Player app from the App Store
Open the app and tap the '+' icon to add a new playlist
Enter the M3U URL provided in your welcome email
Your channels should now load and be ready to watch
smart-tv: On your Smart TV, go to the app store (Samsung Store, LG Content Store, etc.)
Search for and download an IPTV player app
Open the app and navigate to 'Settings' or 'Add a playlist'
Select the option to add a playlist via URL
Enter the M3U URL provided in your welcome email
Save the settings and return to the main screen
Your channels should now load and be ready to watch
pc: Download and install VLC Media Player or another IPTV-compatible player
Open the player and go to 'Media' > 'Open Network Stream'
Paste the M3U URL provided in your welcome email
For a better experience, consider using dedicated apps like MyIPTV Player or Kodi with the PVR IPTV Simple Client add-on

help_section.title: Need Additional Help?
help_section.description: If you encounter installation or configuration issues, our support team is available 24/7 to assist you.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our IPTV service. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. By using our service, you consent to the data practices described in this policy.

information_we_collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
information_we_collect.content: We may collect several types of information from and about users of our service, including:
items: Personal information such as name, email address, and payment information
Usage data such as viewing habits, login times, and device information
Technical data such as IP address, browser type, and operating system

how_we_collect.title: 3. How We Collect Information
items: Directly from you when you register for our service, make a purchase, or contact customer support
Automatically as you navigate through our service using cookies and similar technologies
From third-party service providers such as payment processors

how_we_use.title: 4. How We Use Your Information
how_we_use.content: We may use the information we collect about you for various purposes, including:
items: Providing and maintaining our service
Processing your payments and subscriptions
Personalizing your experience
Improving our service
Communicating with you about service updates, offers, and promotions
Monitoring and analyzing usage patterns and trends
Detecting, preventing, and addressing technical issues

disclosure.title: 5. Disclosure of Your Information
disclosure.content: We may disclose your personal information:
items: To comply with legal obligations
To protect and defend our rights and property
To prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the service
To third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf
With your consent

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the security of your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

your_rights.title: 7. Your Data Protection Rights
your_rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:
items: The right to access your personal information
The right to rectify inaccurate personal information
The right to request the deletion of your personal information
The right to restrict the processing of your personal information
The right to data portability
The right to object to processing

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not intended for children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@example.com.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Please read these terms carefully before using our service

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using our IPTV service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: Our IPTV service provides users with access to television content over Internet Protocol networks. The content available through our service may change from time to time without prior notice.

points.p1: To access our IPTV service, you must purchase a subscription.
points.p2: All subscription fees are non-refundable except as expressly set forth in our refund policy.
points.p3: We reserve the right to change subscription fees at any time. Any changes to subscription fees will be effective upon renewal of your subscription.
points.p4: You are responsible for all charges incurred under your account, including applicable taxes.

points.p1: You agree not to share your account credentials with any third party.
points.p2: You agree not to use our service for any illegal purpose or in violation of any local, state, national, or international law.
points.p3: You agree not to redistribute, retransmit, or rebroadcast any content obtained through our service.
points.p4: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.

points.p1: We do not guarantee the availability of any specific content.
points.p2: We are not responsible for the content provided through our service and make no warranties or representations regarding the content's accuracy, reliability, or quality.

points.p1: We strive to provide uninterrupted service, but we do not guarantee that the service will be available at all times.
points.p2: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate the service for maintenance or any other reason without prior notice.

intellectual.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content provided through our service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You agree not to reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works based on any content obtained through our service.

points.p1: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason.
points.p2: Upon termination, your right to use the service will immediately cease.

liability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall we be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of or inability to access or use the service.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms of Service at any time. It is your responsibility to review these Terms of Service periodically for changes.

contact.title: 11. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@example.com.
